string.value: After I handed him all the ingredients, #p2040052# sprinkled the ink on the book. Before our eyes, the ink soaked into the pages and restored the words! It revealed information about the bowman's ultimate skill! What could that be? It sounds powerful...I should go ask #b#p1012100##k. \n\n#t4161024# #b#c4161024# / 1#k.

When I asked #p1012100# about the book, she was shocked! I related the entire tale of the ink restoring the pages, and how #p2040052# mentioned it was made with invisible ink to prevent knowledge of this technique from spreading into unworthy hands. She has agreed to take a further look into the book to find out more.
Ok, I made the ink. Let me spray it in the book like this...Oh! I can see something forming...a sentence! Another one! The ink is working!

Now, you can read the book, and perhaps find some information in it that will help you. I don't know what it's all about, though it mentioned something about Bowman. As a matter of fact, #b#p1012100##k may be interested in this book. You may want to pay them a visit.
Do you want to take the book? It's quite bulky and not good to carry around during your trip. I'll keep in the library until you take it back.
You are a Bowman. I can help you with training if you want, but you look strong enough already. What brought you here?
This book? #bThe Bowman's Ultimate Skill#k...! Wait a minute...
Hmm? This book is about the Bowman class, so I recommend that you discuss this with someone who'd know about that class. Maybe #b#p1012100##k of #m100000000# could help you.
If you are a Bowman, it's no trouble at all.
You lost the book, I see. Fortunately, someone picked it up and brought it to the library. Here you go.
